data.title: The Lord of the Rings Games
data.meta_description: The Lord of the Rings is an epic fantasy novel written by J.R.R. Tolkein during the early 20th century. The saga has  been continually celebrated by intellectuals and fantasy enthusiasts for generations. Many fantasy writers and especially fantasy RPG developers consider it as a major inspiration.
data.text:
The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria

October 24, 2023

PC

PS5

The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is a survival game set during The Fourth Age of Middle-earth, which is after the events of the books and films.

Middle-earth: Shadow of War - The Mobile Game

September 27, 2017

IPHN

IPAD

ANDR

The mobile version of Shadow of War allows players to collect and command characters from throughout Tolkien's lore.

Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor

September 30, 2014

MAC

X360

+ 5 more

PS3

PC

XONE

PS4

LIN

An open-world action-adventure game by Monolith, set between the events of The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

The Lord of the Rings Online: Helm's Deep

November 20, 2013

MAC

PC

Helm's Deep is an expansion for The Lord of the Rings Online released on November 20, 2013.

LEGO The Lord of the Rings

October 30, 2012

X360

PS3

+ 9 more

Wii

DS

XBGS

PS3N

PC

3DS

ANDR

VITA

PSNV

Traveller's Tales brings the LEGO treatment to The Lord of the Rings, following the events of all three movies.

The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

November 1, 2011

MAC

X360

+ 4 more

PS3

XBGS

PS3N

PC

The game is an action RPG featuring cooperative multiplayer developed by Snowblind Studios under the Lord of the Rings license. The game draws on both literary and movie influences to tell the story of three warriors fighting in the North of Middle Earth concurrently with the events of the books/movies.

The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard

September 27, 2011

PC

The third expansion for Lord of the Rings Online, Rise of Isengard will see the game's story line reach The Two Towers.

The Lord of the Rings Online: The Siege of Mirkwood

December 1, 2009

PC

A digital expansion to the Lord of the Rings Online MMORPG that focuses on the forest of Mirkwood and the tower of Dol Guldur.

The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria

November 14, 2008

PC

Mines of Moria was the first expansion pack released for the MMORPG, Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar.

The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar

April 24, 2007

PC

A free-to-play MMORPG set in the Lord of the Rings universe, at the same time as The Fellowship of the Ring.

The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II - The Rise of the Witch-King

November 28, 2006

PC

This expansion pack to The Battle for Middle-Earth II offers more than a lengthy title with a whole new faction and numerous other gameplay changes. Middle-Earth is threatened by the Witch-King of Angmar, and war ensues.

The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II

March 2, 2006

X360

PC

The follow-up to EA's well-received Lord of the Rings RTS, adding custom hero creation, free placement of buildings, and a story mode that covers lesser-known battles from the books.

The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth

December 6, 2004

PC

The Battle For Middle-Earth is a RTS based on the Lord of the Rings Licence. Players can control four major factions from the Lord of the Rings; Isengard, Gondor, Mordor and Rohan.

The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age

November 2, 2004

GBA

PS2

+ 2 more

GCN

XBOX

The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age is a role-playing game depicting the adventures of the "Shadow Fellowship," a group of unknowns following in the footsteps of the Fellowship of the Ring.

The Lord of the Rings

October 2003

PIN

The Lord of the Rings is a pinball machine based on the franchise of the same name.
